name: Clothes Shop
description:
Welcome to the Clothes Shop! We sell Clothes... and Weapons!

Controls: 

- Keyboard/Mouse: WASD (move/navigate) + SPACE (interact) / MouseLeftClick (interact)

- Mobile: Press and Hold (Move) + Tap (Interact)

----------------------------------------------------------

Hello! This is a project for an Job Interview!

It also runs on Android! (Download the .apk and install on your phone)

I used TDD and also used the Project Board from Github.

GitHub: https://github.com/danielcardosot17/clothes_shop

Feel free to ask me any questions!
